translations: n．运动性：生物体或细胞自发地或在刺激下产生的运动能力。
· The motilities of bacteria help them move toward or away from certain stimuli.
细菌的运动性有助于它们朝向或远离某些刺激。

sentences.sentence: To realize low or no pollution, the clean automobile became one of the most dominating choices after exploring various new fuels, new resources and new motilities.
sentences.translation: 为了达到低污染或零污染，经过对各种新燃料、新能源和新动力的探索，清洁汽车成为最主要的选择之一。
